snippet.title: Paladins - The Hero Shooter Arrives on Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
The champions are coming to Nintendo Switch with 60 FPS gameplay and crossplay multiplayer!  Become a founder for Early Access, available June 12th on the Nintendo eShop.  Learn more about Paladins at http://www.paladins.com

Unlock the Onyx Stallion mount, free and exclusive to our YouTube subscribers: https://www.paladins.com/community

Follow us for updates!
http://facebook.com/paladinsgame
http://twitter.com/paladinsgame

Enter a fantasy world of ancient technology in Paladins, a team-based shooter with strategy elements and deep character customization. Through a unique card system, players can amplify and augment a character’s core set of abilities to play exactly how they want to play.  Paladins is a free-to-play, class-based first person shooter from Hi-Rez Studios, currently available on PC, Mac, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4. Learn more at www.paladins.com!
